channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mega pothole from roundabout to petrol station, 15th April
item.description:
The road has disintegrated and potholes or rather a crater stretches from the roundabout to the petrol station. Some of it is so deep that it probably about 20 to 30cm deep. This has been an issue for at least 4 months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Hine Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 15th April
item.description:
Very bad . In fact this whine stretch of road needs resurfacing. Each fix lasts weeks. Thus cannot be cost effective

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 117 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rut across road, 15th April
item.description:
Rut across road where telecoms utility did work.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Sandy Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Latch missing on gate, 15th April
item.description:
….the gate onto Kidnappers Lane, has had the fastening ripped off, so it now doesn’t shut. It’s dangerous for children and dogs. Please can you arrange for it to be fixed? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Field Cottage Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken paving slabs, 15th April
item.description:
Broken and uneven slabs in pavement which seem to have appeared following a utility repair (water?). Near corner of Princes Road and Alexandra Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Prince's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated flooding and standing water, 15th April
item.description:
Every time it rains this area becomes flooded and standing water covers half of the road. This really needs to be addressed as cars are driving on the other side of the road and pedestrians are getting soaked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 College Lawn, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes - dangerous for cyclists (now 30cm wide / 15cm deep), 15th April
item.description:
Potholes outside Leckhampton Village Hall for weeks. Several of them getting larger after recent heavy rains, 30+cm wide / 15+cm deep. They are getting harder to avoid in cars, and even more so by cyclists. A bike hitting one of these potholes could result in a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Leckhampton Village Hall Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge dumped in Coppice Gate car park., 15th April
item.description:
Old fridge dumped in the car park and 2 old arm chairs dumped beside the green wheelie bins in Coppice Gate, which the bin men clearly won't be able to take as far too large.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 68 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hige pothole on mini roundabout by Swindon road and Tommy Taylors lane, 14th April
item.description:
Dangerous pothole on roundabout One of many in area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Tommy Taylor's Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving stones, sinking and causing holes. Trip hazard., 14th April
item.description:
Lots of loose paving stones. Really uneven, lots of holes and stones sticking out. Causing water to pool

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Juniper Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 14th April
item.description:
Multiple deep pot holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 6 potholes more than 75mm deep, 14th April
item.description:
6 potholes that need fixing which are all more than 75mm deep. Next door to school & pedestrian traffic lights

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 East End Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 large potholes over 75mm deep, 14th April
item.description:
Numerous potholes more than 75mm deep. Close to a school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 East End Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 14th April
item.description:
Pothole in lane 2
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two of three cycle stands damaged by motor vehicles, 14th April
item.description:
Significant damage to two of the three pavement mounted cycle stands, making them much harder to use and less secure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Acton House, 13 Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes at the traffic lights, 14th April
item.description:
Multiple pot holes at a number of the traffic lights in this spot where major roads join. Limited option for drivers to avoid driving through very large pot holes causing excessive car damage especially in bad weather. I imagine this disrupts the nearby residents with noise also
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Valiant Way, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 14th April
item.description:
More deep potholes that need addressing. It’s an accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 282a London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes, 14th April
item.description:
There have been very deep potholes all lined up down the edge of this road. This is extremely dangerous for cyclists and very damaging to cars. The fact that there are wires in the one closest to the traffic lights lead me to believe that the wires may be live. Shocking state of our roads. I would love to know where my money is going.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive vehicle damaging pothole, 14th April
item.description:
Caused damage to my front passenger tire. Just after left turn going towards Cirencester Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 The Red Cottages Ermin Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three potholes up this road, 14th April
item.description:
There are 3 potholes up this road - it's hard to mark them on the map but they are before Craig House (or similar, I don't know exactly what it's called).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cliff House Leckhampton Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
